0422b4b478684508ac63e235e518aa6e35f83429.query: SELECT account_id FROM account_transactions WHERE transaction_id = $1

1df27b7293e91747dee8d5d7e1286975a23c8d53.query: UPDATE users SET name=$2, display=$3, is_admin=$4 WHERE id=$1

23745f964aba02ba7e16e72cb9312e66470400c7.query:
SELECT DISTINCT t.id FROM transactions t, users u, account_rights ar, accounts a, account_transactions at
        WHERE (t.id=$1 OR t.related_trans=$1)
        AND u.id=$2
        AND (u.is_admin
            OR
            (
                ar.user_id = u.id
                AND ar.account_id = a.id
                AND at.account_id = a.id
                AND at.transaction_id = t.id
            )
        );

257bc6234de8ac9aed4fa2f3cdceca12f1915be6.query: SELECT id FROM account_rights WHERE user_id=$1 AND account_id=$2

31b12979452732ea05dddc45f302302a993b4537.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS account_transactions (
                id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                account_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                transaction_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                FOREIGN KEY(account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id),
                FOREIGN KEY(transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(id))

392d63705ff96fd46ab83ada93236775b4c148ee.query: SELECT id, broker, account_name FROM accounts

39f8730c65cb517f18d66a5ab51eed84604cf32c.query:
SELECT
            t.id
            ,(CASE WHEN t.related_trans IS null THEN t.id 
                ELSE t.related_trans
                END) AS group_id
            , a.id AS "asset_id?"
            , t.position
            , t.trans_type
            , t.cash_amount
            , t.cash_currency_id
            , t.cash_date
            , t.note
            , d.path as "path?"
            , at.account_id
            , c.iso_code
            , c.rounding_digits
        FROM
            currencies c,
            transactions t
            LEFT JOIN assets a ON a.id = t.asset_id
            LEFT JOIN documents d ON d.transaction_id = t.id
            JOIN account_transactions at ON at.transaction_id = t.id
        WHERE 
            a.id = $1
            AND c.id = t.cash_currency_id
            AND at.account_id = ANY($2)
        ORDER BY t.cash_date desc, group_id, t.id

4275990dcdd6ce58870d36b85a890ef7fba18f3c.query:
SELECT
            t.id
            ,(CASE WHEN t.related_trans IS null THEN t.id 
                ELSE t.related_trans
                END) AS group_id
            , a.id AS "asset_id?"
            , t.position
            , t.trans_type
            , t.cash_amount
            , t.cash_currency_id
            , t.cash_date
            , t.note
            , d.path AS "path?"
            , at.account_id
            , c.iso_code
            , c.rounding_digits
        FROM
            currencies c,
            transactions t
            LEFT JOIN assets a ON a.id = t.asset_id
            LEFT JOIN documents d ON d.transaction_id = t.id
            JOIN account_transactions at ON at.transaction_id = t.id
        WHERE 
            c.id = t.cash_currency_id
            AND at.account_id = ANY($1)
            ORDER BY t.cash_date DESC, group_id, t.id

459fd856f9100cd660c15a332a721b5142d681f3.query: SELECT id FROM accounts where broker=$1 AND account_name=$2

5813af3ac89f3bf5cfa0e9430e6be959e3c8df97.query: SELECT path FROM documents WHERE transaction_id=$1

5adf5862553545c94b87d50042d4f26a2e631d30.query: SELECT transaction_id, path FROM documents WHERE hash=$1

6731b5cbb4901c40637bed0fa7de064b23b2e45a.query: SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = $1

6740b80a410ecf8ba9f4fccb7d68128c5f94cf3d.query:
SELECT 
                    t.id, 
                    t.trans_type, 
                    t.asset_id, 
                    t.cash_amount, 
                    t.cash_currency_id, 
                    t.cash_date, 
                    t.related_trans, 
                    t.position, 
                    t.note,
                    c.iso_code,
                    c.rounding_digits
                FROM 
                    transactions t, 
                    account_transactions a,
                    currencies c
                WHERE 
                    a.account_id = $1 
                    AND a.transaction_id = t.id
                    AND c.id = t.cash_currency_id
                ORDER BY
                    t.cash_date

6a4fd15145140c4f5e3601464cd4b8fa0e74e422.query:
SELECT 
                    t.id, 
                    t.trans_type, 
                    t.asset_id, 
                    t.cash_amount, 
                    t.cash_currency_id, 
                    t.cash_date, 
                    t.related_trans, 
                    t.position, 
                    t.note,
                    c.iso_code,
                    c.rounding_digits 
                FROM 
                    transactions t, 
                    account_transactions a,
                    currencies c
                WHERE 
                    a.account_id = $1 
                    AND a.transaction_id = t.id 
                    AND t.cash_date BETWEEN $2 AND $3
                    AND c.id = t.cash_currency_id

6aeb6bfe1747d11d5aa9ac3be10e10222b4ffb7f.query: SELECT id, name, display, is_admin FROM users WHERE id = $1

6e1d35d6410733c2d5e677b621f9d15d4bbb1a26.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_settings (
                id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                user_id INTEGER UNIQUE,
                settings JSON,
                FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(id))

741bcd108a9bb678f9eca22a82118ca0cbc3c515.query: INSERT INTO documents (transaction_id, hash, path) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING id

78e01beb0c03eba84d0ba233d664057c1f10259d.query: INSERT INTO accounts (broker, account_name) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id

7b8c125724183329597e1ed7a28354d6f4215fe3.query:
INSERT INTO user_settings (user_id, settings)
        VALUES($1,$2) 
        ON CONFLICT (user_id) 
        DO 
        UPDATE SET settings = $2

7d927c0ee32bbdf3ea70f12db33e4c4c147b9fb1.query: SELECT id FROM users WHERE name = $1 AND is_admin

81d9edbd613ccf7926b2becc188446e851cbe2ed.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
            id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
            name TEXT NOT NULL,
            display TEXT,
            salt_hash TEXT NOT NULL,
            is_admin BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT False,
            UNIQUE (name))

838599ec25fdc2dd77d4cbbffc3f44766ef14eb3.query:
CREATE TABLE pdf_files (
                id int4 NOT NULL,
                pdf bytea NOT NULL,
                FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES documents(id))

8d9f9059c09ec49e5ed8cb1e7e4a395f8ab726af.query: SELECT a.id, a.broker, a.account_name FROM accounts a, account_rights r WHERE r.account_id = a.id AND r.user_id=$1

9d28f744ac0516a5c256242651560dfbfdb7c2a2.query:
SELECT id, name, display, is_admin FROM users WHERE name = $1 AND 
                salt_hash = crypt($2, salt_hash)

a1777934752b658b5791552b9829e0bae5bd098f.query:
SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.broker, a.account_name
            FROM
                accounts a,
                account_rights ar,
                account_transactions at,
                users u
            WHERE
                at.account_id = a.id
                AND at.transaction_id = $1
                AND u.id = $2
                AND ar.account_id = a.id
                AND (ar.user_id = u.id
                    OR u.is_admin
                    );

a482feb6c0752ac3171d6445510dd60778993bf2.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS documents (
                id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                transaction_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                hash TEXT NOT NULL,
                path TEXT NOT NULL,
                FOREIGN KEY(transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(id))

                salt_hash = crypt($2, salt_hash)

c77da158fcca3d32ca14121b5a425b871289c03f.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS accounts (
                id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                broker TEXT NOT NULL,

cc605a0205ef4d6433bcc2a844175c1f5e02f72d.query:

                VALUES ($1, $2, crypt($3,gen_salt('bf',8)), $4) RETURNING id

db60cdecfdbf0d64b8716126987887243527ca54.query: UPDATE users SET salt_hash=crypt($2, gen_salt('bf',8)) WHERE id=$1

e6ad1499aad0b15f536e01e16ec577f5e8aaf3f4.query:
SELECT
                d.id, d.hash, d.path
            FROM documents d
            LEFT OUTER JOIN pdf_files p ON d.id=p.id
            WHERE p.id IS NULL

                    account_name=$1, 
                    broker=$2
                WHERE id=($3)

ee44c2e82afab370ed64a67d739e8e2684708c57.query:
SELECT 
                    t.id, 
                    t.trans_type, 
                    t.asset_id, 
                    t.cash_amount, 
                    t.cash_currency_id, 
                    t.cash_date, 
                    t.related_trans, 
                    t.position, 
                    t.note,
                    c.iso_code,
                    c.rounding_digits
                FROM 
                    transactions t, 
                    account_transactions a,
                    currencies c
                WHERE 
                    a.account_id = $1 
                    AND a.transaction_id = t.id 
                    AND t.cash_date < $2
                    AND c.id = t.cash_currency_id

f1fe1f80a7fa01b7aa12318f6bfd164ec72d4f73.query: UPDATE account_transactions SET account_id=$3 WHERE transaction_id=$1 AND account_id=$2

f4e58c1bb28a0f5b99467b24e0a353a63fe63bdc.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
                id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                name TEXT NOT NULL,
                display TEXT NOT NULL,
                salt_hash TEXT NOT NULL,
                is_admin BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT False,
                UNIQUE (name))

fe5ce15a85f0bea59c985eb8d1b5bfe290caaca9.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS account_rights (
            id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
            user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            account_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
            FOREIGN KEY(account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id))
